turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello there! how may I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna Pizzeria, it's a new Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me take down your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That should be the 17 cheese brand.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order was.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 large pizzas, 1 with bay leaves, olives, and sun dried tomatoes, 1 mighty meat lovers pizza, and 1 of the 17 cheese blend pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I need extra cheese on all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, I've added extra cheese for all 3 pizzas. The total is now $55.39.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should I place the order for you now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do I have to tip?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sorry, could you repeat that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do I gave to tip anyone?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not for pick up orders, no.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. And how long when will that be ready for pickup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Once I place the order, it should take 35 mins to bake.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Sounds good. Place the order. Yes, Google.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should I place the order for you now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I've placed the order. I've also sent you the receipt via text.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Enjoy!
